name: RBG Quest demo
description:
RBG Quest is a two-dimensional(2D) strategy and adventure game which is being developed by Lì Wén (Manhai-pictures). The available file is a demo of the actual game which will be released soon.

Plot

The player will be the protagonist of the story where he will have to travel through the three dimensions of the RBG realms. However, the task will not be easy as traps have been placed on some of the paths. The player will use strategies to avoid dangerous steps and will also try to disarm certain bombs whenever he or she is unlucky.
Good luck, adventurer and may you save the fate of the three kingdoms !!!
